subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets hypothesized that pitching to Cespedes would require so much attention from opponents that their other batters would benefit. Lucas Duda hit behind Cespedes on Saturday, and crushed two home runs.
snippet: The Mets hypothesized that pitching to Cespedes would require so much attention from opponents that their other batters would benefit. Lucas Duda hit behind Cespedes on Saturday, and crushed two home runs.
